statement.title: Write the challenge's statement for
statement.markdownTitle: This is what your statement and clue will look like:
statement.descriptionHint: Write a sentence for the exercise. Make it concise and clearly express the goal. You can use **bold**, _italics_ and :wink: emojis with Markdown syntax.
